column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday February 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in BOTH DIRECTIONS until further notice due to at least three collisions, including one serious collision.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: Traffic on both the outer loop and inner loop sides is being diverted to the exit ramps.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: Motorists should avoid the outer loop of New Circle Rd between Versailles Rd and Harrodsburg Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT HARRODSBURG RD:
column4: Motorists should also avoid the inner loop of New Circle Rd between Nicholasville Rd and Harrodsburg Rd.
UPDATE:  Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column5: Intersection closed thru at least Monday 2/6 late night due to repairs on a 16" water main break and damaged communication lines.
